Title: Flight of the Navigator
Writer: Mark H. Baker (story), Michael Burton (screenplay), Phil Joanou (screenplay)
Actors: Joey Cramer, Paul Reubens, Cliff De Young, Veronica Cartwright
Plot: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.
Production: Walt Disney Pictures, Viking Film, Producers Sales Organization
